page.title: 05TRADE
page.content: There is very little tradingas distinct from industry in this area.The Eastfields area has only a handfull of shops.In the area there are only two shops.Both are 'cornor shops'inthat they sell a large range of day-to-day products, from food and drink to clothing.Both are run by Asians with great success.This lack of shops is often a great complaint but the planners still see that housing, shops and industry all need to be kept separate. The fengate site is mainly industrial.However there are a number of units which first began to service the wholesale trade and then began to attract retail business e.g. tyre fitting, paint and 'Do-It-Yourself',car garage/repairs and heating services.
